segments.text: I find myself staring at the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through it, I can see a perfectly calm and tidy garden, a really pleasant sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a peaceful view, almost idyllic, which makes the inside feel even more chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to stream from the faucet, completely filling the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It flows over the front, creating a waterfall onto the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm utterly surprised the woman hasn't noticed this incredible overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on that plate is just absolute, almost trance-like.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is so completely engrossed in her task, deaf and blind to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a strange kind of detachment, to be honest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, meanwhile, are conducting their own little raid, just out of her sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One moment, everything will be fine, and the next, a cascade of accidents will occur.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s hard to reconcile the calm exterior with the brewing storm within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a carefully composed moment of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR
